title: With 590 marks can I get GMC Nagpur? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all I’ll tell you that 590 is a decent score in NEET 2020. You should be assured of getting into a Government Medical College in Maharashtra, provided you hold a domicile and have done your class 10th and 12th from Maharashtra. But my friend, when we talk of GMC Nagpur, its one of Maharashtra’s finest Medical Colleges, and is more coveted than many other Government Medical Colleges. So considering the high demand of this college, to be honest there are very FEW chances of you getting into this particular college, if you’re a general category candidate. This is not to dishearten you, but to acquaint you with the truth. If you’re OBC NCL then there is a chance of you getting into this one. SC/ST candidates can surely make it to GMC Nagpur with a score of 590. Hope this helps. :)

Congratulations on such an awesome score. We can't be very adamant about what college one will get, before the results are out. But, it's quiet sure that you'll get a Govt. Medical College . All the best.
